Even I've been looking for that manga... No luck. I think they stopped printing? (somebody please correct me on this!) But nevertheless, I hope ADV licenses Imon Peacemaker.. That way, fans won't have to scour for them in obscure places. 
 
If you're okay with scanlations, I suggest Manga City. I don't know if they have it over at Direct Manga, but check it out just in case. And oh! www.stoptazmo.com also have them.
 
Or if you want, the pm_kurogane community over at LJ created an email account for the downloaded scans. You can just email them to yourself from there ^^ For details, please contact me privately.
 
 
~Kane


Bunny ^_^ <shenlong71328@...> wrote:
In addition to Logan's question... I was reading the
manga that ADV put out and got hooked.   I was
wondering if anyone knows where you can find
Shinsengumi Imon in english.  And if anyone knows if
ADV is planing on realeaseing the rest of Kurogane.  
Thanks a bunch to all. ^______________^

-Bunneh
